title: Champion Concept : Ray, the bionic man/cyborg
body:
Hi I just wanted to let you know  that I'm not good with percentages but I hope you consider my idea/s.Thank you
P.S. I won't write a lore that is up to you guys.
Ray the bionic man
Birthplace: Zaun
Primary roles - Tank
                       - Fighter    Main field position - ?
Q(Power fist) -Ray slams his fist into the ground slowing nearby enemies by 15% dealing 20% more damage than his basic attack this attack can also be effected by items. 

W(Energy blast) -Ray launches a beam out of his bionic eye causing two random effects to an enemy champion and dealing 30% more damage then a basic attack and one hitting an area of minions.

E(Plasma cannon) -Ray shoots out three plasma balls out of his bionic arm silencing the enemy and dealing 50% more than a basic attack.

R(Power burst / Power eruption) -Ray uses all his energy to make a burst or eruption come out of his mouth dealing a huge chunk of damage and knocking up the enemy this however slows himself by 25%.

-360 No Hotdog out

replies.body: LOL wat even dude you said thanks to a sarcastic comment LOL.
Is it just me our is the passive missing.
